title: Himi 80
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
’Oku tupu ia Sīsū
‘A e ngaahi me’a lelei,
‘A e me’a ki he sino
Pea mo e laumālie.
2.
He ‘oku ne tuku atu
Hono Laumālie lelei
Ki he kakai kotoa pē
Ko honau ue’i lelei.
3.
Pea ko e tui foki
‘Oku tupu ‘i he ‘Eiki
Pea ‘oku ‘i he ‘Eiki
Hono fa’a tokoni’i.
4.
’Eiki ‘oku mau feinga
Ke tupu ai ‘emau tui,
Pea mau fa’a ikuna
Homau fili kotoa pē.
5.
Ko e me’a ‘i he tui
‘Oku ‘i ho Laumālie,
‘Oku mau toki lava’i
‘A ho’o ngāue mo’oni. *
